project_abstract.cdata: The Third Industrial Modernization Project willist in financing the modernization and expansion of three industrial enterprises: Zavodi Crvena Zastava, which manufactures automobiles; Zeljezara Sisak, which produces steel tubes; and Industria Poljoprivrednih Masina, which produces combine harvesters and automotive wheels.
